segments.text: I'd like to cancel my reservation on flight MS701 to Warsaw on the 23rd.My name is Michael .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hold on for a moment . ( a few minutes later ) I have cancelled your reservation.Shall I make another one for you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I see . Please call us again for any further reservation.Thanks for calling us .
segments.speaker: S2
